title: CBT Nuggets - Check Point CCSA GAiA 156-215.76
description:
Check Point CCSA GAiA 156-215.76 by Keith Barker
Check Point Certified Security Administration <a href="
http://www.cbtnuggets.com/it-training-videos/course/checkpoint_ccsa" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.cbtnuggets.com/it-training-videos/course/checkpoint_ccsa</a>


This Check Point CCSA video training series with Keith Barker covers how to configure and manage a Check Point deployment.

Recommended Skills:
Basic knowledge of networking
Basic Windows or Linux skills

Recommended equipment:
Virtualization S/W such as VBox or VMware
Check_Point_Install_and_Upgrade_R76.Gaia.iso

Related Certifications:
Check Point CCSA (Check Point Certified Administrator)
Check Point CCSE (Check Point Certified Security Expert)


Content:
01 - Welcome!
02 - Check Point Fundamentals
03 - Installing GAiA
04 - Linking the Manager & Firewall
05 - Pushing Policy
06 - NAT
07 - Policy Packages & Database Versions
08 - SmartView Tracker
09 - SmartView Monitor
10 - LDAP
11 - Identity Awareness
12 - HTTPS Inspection
13 - App Control and URL Filtering
14 - CLI
15 - IPsec VPNs (Site to Site)
16 - Backup and Recovery
17 - Smart Update
18 - Additional Check Point Features
19 - CCSA Exam Success
